product_name: Gear Aid Silnet Silicone Seam Sealer - 1.5 oz.
long_description: Silnet(TM) Silicone Seam Sealer is specially formulated for sealing seams on tents and other products constructed or coated with silicone. Perfect for silicone-treated nylon. May also be used as an in-field repair material for moderate rips, tears and areas of abrasion.
short_description: Silnet(TM) Silicone Seam Sealer is specially formulated for sealing seams on tents and other products constructed or coated with silicone.
